valueProposition.title: Transform your event with our smoothie bikes
valueProposition.subtitle: A unique, memorable and eco-friendly experience
valueProposition.description1: Voilà Vélo Fruité is a pop-up event company that promotes health and wellness using our Quebec-made blender bikes.
valueProposition.description2: Make your next event a fun and healthy success! We have experience organizing unique pop-up events to meet your needs. Choose one of our popular packages or contact us for a quote before we're all pedaled out!

whyChooseWorkshop.title: Why choose our Voilà Vélo workshop?
whyChooseWorkshop.subtitle: Because it's fun, sustainable, and unforgettable!
whyChooseWorkshop.description: At Voilà Vélo, we believe that learning, moving, and enjoying yourself can go hand in hand. Our Smoothie Vélo workshop is more than just an activity — it's an experience that inspires healthy habits, one pedal-powered smoothie at a time.

ecoFriendly.title: Eco-friendly and energy-free
ecoFriendly.description: No electricity needed! Smoothies are blended by participant pedal power — a zero-emission, 100% human-powered activity that makes sustainability exciting.

sustainability.title: A hands-on approach to sustainability
sustainability.description: Participants become creators, not just consumers. It's a unique way to understand the impact of our actions, while embracing physical effort and environmental awareness.

healthy.title: Healthy, tasty, and joyful
healthy.description: Our smoothies are made on-site with fresh, colorful ingredients and a big dose of fun — combining nutrition and movement for all ages.

events.title: Perfect for all kinds of events
events.description: From schools and festivals to corporate or community events — our workshop adapts to your crowd. It's inclusive, interactive, and unforgettable.

values.title: We pedal for our values
values.description: We use reusable or compostable materials, reduce waste, and promote mindful consumption — all in a lively and welcoming atmosphere.
